Botticelli

Checklist for till end of day process

  1. Print reports from both POS tills.
    • Step 1: Open OrderMate
    • Step 2: Go to System Admin
    • Step 3: Print reports (First 2 with a green tick)
  2. Print Settlement from EFTPOS Machines
    • Step 1: Click Menu
    • Step 2: Go to Settlements and reports
    • Step 3: Click Print
  3. Attach the EFTPOS report to the corresponding OrderMate reports
  4. Highlight Tips from both terminals on EFTPOS reports
  5. Highlight “ALL CARDS TOTAL” on OrderMate reports
  6. Get cash tips from the front and the bar
    • Change it for the biggest notes you can in order to leave change in the till
  7. Write amount of cash tips and EFTPOS tips in the envelope
  8. Make sure all the names in the envelope are right
  9. Count all the cash (write down the amount of each coin and note.
  10. Sum everything and minus the float to leave in the till (= $ 250)
  11. Grab the Closing till sheet
  12. Put down all the information as required
  13. If there’s any vouchers, in the report appears as “Web payment”
  14. Add all the cash, EFTPOS takings and web payments
  15. The total should match with the “TOTAL TAKINGS” (big number on the bottom of the reports).
  16. Sign the sheet
  17. If there’s any discrepancies, write them down on the closing till sheet down the bottom
